dictiomary.title: Kreepy Krampus
dictiomary.start_screen_intro_0: Krampus is cruel, malevolent and spite
dictiomary.start_screen_intro_1: disguised as another he hides out of sight
dictiomary.start_screen_intro_2: if he finds you your in for a fright
dictiomary.start_screen_intro_3: so save yourself by making it to midnight
dictiomary.unsupported_screen_intro_2: on a Desktop computer to play.
dictiomary.success_text_0: You managed to escape before it was too late
dictiomary.success_text_1: unfortunately not all come to the same fate
dictiomary.fail_text_0: You've been taken to Krampus's lair
dictiomary.fail_text_1: where you'll be spending the rest of your Christmas there...
dictiomary.social_network_fail: Can you make it to midnight? #ChristmasExperiments #KreepyKrampus
